visualization_prompt: Create a Highcharts chartOptions object to render a spline chart with the following specifications: Chart type is spline, chart title is 'Monthly Data Trends', axes and labels styling includes black color for labels and titles with a font size of 14px, data series includes one series named 'Monthly Data' with the provided data, custom colors are not specified, and additional configurations include a white background and a legend positioned at the bottom of the chart.
visualization_explanation: The provided Highcharts chartOptions object is configured to render a spline chart with a title 'Monthly Data Trends'. The chart's background is set to white, and the legend is positioned at the bottom of the chart. The x-axis and y-axis labels, along with the chart title, are styled with a black color and a font size of 14px. The y-axis is logarithmic with a minor tick interval of 0.1. The data series includes one series named 'Monthly Data' with the given data points, which represent monthly trends. This configuration ensures a clear and visually appealing presentation of the data.
